items.title: System Architecture Definition
items.description: Design and document the overall architecture for the hospital management system, including modules for patient records, appointments, billing, and staff management.
acceptance_criteria: Architecture document includes all core modules and their interactions
Technology stack is defined and approved by IT Department
Security and compliance requirements are addressed in the design
non_functional: System must comply with healthcare data protection regulations (e.g., HIPAA)
Architecture must support scalability for at least 500 concurrent users

notes: User request was high-level and vague; assumed initial step is to define system architecture before detailed module requirements.
